bug.author: dongdan39
bug.summary: CustomResourceDefinition.apiextensions.k8s.io "scheduledworkflows.kubeflow.org" is invalid when "kfctl apply" in v0.5.0 and v0.5.1
bug.description:
Hi, Experts, I got the following error when "kfctl apply k8s" on both v0.5.0 and v0.5.1: ERRO[0142] (Will retry) Component pipeline apply failed; Error: handle object: patching object from cluster: merging object with existing state: CustomResourceDefinition.apiextensions.k8s.io "scheduledworkflows.kubeflow.org" is invalid: status.storedVersions[0]: Invalid value: "v1alpha1": must appear in spec.versions filename="ksonnet/ksonnet.go:174" Observed that two pvc are pending: minio-594df758b9-774l5 0/1 Pending 0 9m14s mysql-5d5b5475c4-76l2x 0/1 Pending 0 9m14s [root@centos-7-vm-1 ]# kubectl -n kubeflow describe pod mysql-5d5b5475c4-5mpjf Events: Type Reason Age From Message <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Warning FailedScheduling 4m19s (x339 over 14m) default-scheduler persistentvolumeclaim "mysql-pv-claim" not found Only one pvc is up: [root@centos-7-vm-1 ]# kubectl -n kubeflow get pvc NAME STATUS VOLUME CAPACITY ACCESS MODES STORAGECLASS AGE katib-mysql Bound pvc-c90d27b4-77a6-11e9-ae91-fa163e24b7d2 10Gi RWO default 17m All other pods are up and running, please help. Thanks! [root@centos-7-vm-1 ]# kubectl -n kubeflow get pods NAME READY STATUS RESTARTS AGE ambassador-7b8477f667-7mbqh 1/1 Running 0 15m ambassador-7b8477f667-88zmg 1/1 Running 0 15m ambassador-7b8477f667-xbzd5 1/1 Running 0 15m argo-ui-9cbd45fdf-4pc6v 1/1 Running 0 15m centraldashboard-5779ff648f-952xq 1/1 Running 0 15m jupyter-web-app-5fd56df98c-xwr58 1/1 Running 0 14m katib-ui-97f5d89b6-996nc 1/1 Running 0 14m metacontroller-0 1/1 Running 0 14m minio-594df758b9-h8lfp 0/1 Pending 0 14m ml-pipeline-75b5d4585-hs44n 1/1 Running 2 14m ml-pipeline-scheduledworkflow-56c8f5bc9b-9lfqx 1/1 Running 0 14m mysql-5d5b5475c4-5mpjf 0/1 Pending 0 14m notebooks-controller-686999cc47-2j6df 1/1 Running 0 14m pytorch-operator-798bcb75d7-m7pt2 1/1 Running 0 13m studyjob-controller-7665b868c5-gtvnl 1/1 Running 0 14m tensorboard-76dffc9ffc-fq4v5 1/1 Running 0 13m tf-job-dashboard-6568b7cd67-zb7m4 1/1 Running 0 13m tf-job-operator-7fd9cccbdd-pz4d9 1/1 Running 0 13m vizier-core-6bcbfdb7dd-tglh6 1/1 Running 0 14m vizier-core-rest-d9779d4db-pf4kt 1/1 Running 0 14m vizier-db-54f46c46c6-vngx9 1/1 Running 0 14m vizier-suggestion-bayesianoptimization-5db7bf9b78-54h9z 1/1 Running 0 14m vizier-suggestion-grid-7489985bbd-fv97g 1/1 Running 0 14m vizier-suggestion-hyperband-6cfd4cd7cb-jhwtd 1/1 Running 0 14m vizier-suggestion-random-77874694d6-58nj4 1/1 Running 0 14m workflow-controller-d5cb6468d-pdgsz 1/1 Running 0 15m Cheers, Dan
